---
title: "My name is Ananya"
author: "Ananya C"
---





## Introduction

This is a silly little piece I am writing in Arvind's class. My back is hurting but I'm learning things so that's cool.

### My First Piece of R Code

babynames - table of all babynames in the us from 1880 to 2017

babynames shift+ctrl+M filter(name=="Aditi")





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
```

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggformula)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```

Attaching package: 'scales'
```

:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(babynames)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 1,924,665 × 5
    year sex   name          n   prop
   <dbl> <chr> <chr>     <int>  <dbl>
 1  1880 F     Mary       7065 0.0724
 2  1880 F     Anna       2604 0.0267
 3  1880 F     Emma       2003 0.0205
 4  1880 F     Elizabeth  1939 0.0199
 5  1880 F     Minnie     1746 0.0179
 6  1880 F     Margaret   1578 0.0162
 7  1880 F     Ida        1472 0.0151
 8  1880 F     Alice      1414 0.0145
 9  1880 F     Bertha     1320 0.0135
10  1880 F     Sarah      1288 0.0132
# ℹ 1,924,655 more rows
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames %>% filter(name == "Ananya")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 23 × 5
    year sex   name       n       prop
   <dbl> <chr> <chr>  <int>      <dbl>
 1  1995 F     Ananya    10 0.00000521
 2  1996 F     Ananya     9 0.0000047 
 3  1997 F     Ananya    29 0.0000152 
 4  1998 F     Ananya    37 0.0000191 
 5  1999 F     Ananya    56 0.0000288 
 6  2000 F     Ananya    67 0.0000336 
 7  2001 F     Ananya    87 0.0000439 
 8  2002 F     Ananya   151 0.0000765 
 9  2003 F     Ananya   153 0.0000763 
10  2004 F     Ananya   175 0.0000868 
# ℹ 13 more rows
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames %>% filter(name== "Ananya") %>% 
  gf_line(n ~ year)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::





There were no Ananyas before 1995 :(

Also, my back and stomach stopped hurting :D





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames %>% filter(name == "Anoushka" | name == "Anushka")
```
